snippet.title: While Loop Java Tutorial
snippet.description:
New course coming soon! Learn Java Fast launches on July 1st, 2020. Stay informed and join the waitlist: https://course.alexlorenlee.com/courses/learn-java-fast

- This is the exact code to write while loops in java! ✅I show how to use them in your programs.

👑Start practicing now with 10 free java programs - http://alexlorenlee.com/
🌅 Source Code - https://github.com/alexlorenlee/JavaTutorialCode/blob/master/Loops/WhileDo.java

while(true) {

}

do {

} while(true);

These are the formats for how you create your while and do while loop in java. Now, you can replace "true" with an expression and whenever it's true, it will run the code in the curly braces.

These java while loops can be trick at first... But SURELY you'll get it :) If you followed along, congrats! You learned-by-doing!

I hope you enjoyed this while loop java tutorial! I like to have a nice mix of tutorials and actual projects for you all :)

Do you want to learn how to code in java from scratch? Check out my Java Tutorial For Beginners: https://youtu.be/woJb2hAfkO0

What are you using java while loops and do while loops for? -

Free tips and programs: http://alexlorenlee.com

TheNewBoston: https://youtube.com/user/thenewboston

Alex Lee
